name: LT Conseil Belgium
goal:
Conseil pour les affaires et autres conseils de gestion
Spécialisation affaires européennes et affaires publiques françaises
interests: Budget, Competition, Customs, Energy, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
